name: discord-message-sender
description: Send messages to Obsidian from Discord.
author: okawak

scripts.dev:build: bun run wasm:build && bunx vite build --mode development
scripts.build: bun run wasm:build && bunx vite build --mode production && bun run copy:manifest
scripts.clean:files: bun -e "import fs from 'fs'; import {glob} from 'glob'; ['dist','dev','pkg','main.js','main.js.map',...await glob('*.wasm')].forEach(p => fs.rmSync(p, {recursive:true, force:true}))"
